settings.ttl:
Click here for Men's Size Chart (International)

Key Notes:

  1. Chest Measurement: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape measure parallel to the floor.
  2. Waist Measurement: Measure around the natural waistline, where the waistband of your pants typically sits.
  3. Hip Measurement: Measure around the fullest part of your hips.

Click here for International Shoe Size Chart (Men's)

Tips for Customers:

  • When converting shoe sizes, always refer to the foot length in centimeters or inches, as this is the most accurate way to determine the correct size across different systems.
  • Foot Length (inches and cm): This is the measurement of the length of your foot. To measure, place your foot flat on the floor and measure from the heel to the longest toe. Itâ€™s important to measure both feet, as one foot can be slightly larger than the other.
